sentence: 900, the Sinkhole Mapping Act, a  bipartisan piece of legislation which I introduced with my fellow  Floridian, Gus Bilirakis.
Pallone for yielding  the time, and I thank Chairman Bilirakis for his partnership in this  endeavor, as well.
Speaker, I thank Chairman Bilirakis and  Ranking Member Pallone for bringing this bill forward.
Bilirakis, and Ranking Member Pallone for fighting  for this important piece of legislation.
Speaker, I am deeply grateful to Chair Guthrie, Ranking Member  Pallone, Chair Bilirakis, and all the members of the Energy and  Commerce Committee for their support.

I also thank Chairman Bilirakis and my co-leads,  Representatives Salazar, Dean, and Pfluger, as well as Senator Cruz and  Senator Klobuchar, my compatriot many days, who works to prioritize  violence against women.
Speaker, I thank the gentleman for yielding, as well  as his leadership and that of Chair Bilirakis on this important issue.
Of course, I particularly want to commend Subcommittee Chair  Bilirakis and Ranking Member Schakowsky for their years of hard work on  this legislation.
